physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hypoactivity, hypotonia, and sensitivity to passive movement.
Frontal bossing, a short nose, a depressed nasal bridge, papular skin rash on hands.
Flexion contractures in elbow, hip, knee, and ankle with swollen joints and body pain.
Gingival hypertrophy, failure to thrive, cannot raise head or sit up unaided.
Recurrent acute bronchitis or pneumonia 3-5 times every year and persistent diarrhoea.
Diarrhoea with severe dehydration, seizure, and coma, recovered after treatment.
Gingival hyperplasia leading to facial deformity, pearly papules around neck, cutaneous nodules on chest, back, and right ear, hyperpigmentation on abdomen and back, perianal plaques.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Joint contractures had not progressed after 1 year of age.
